docs.text: inspired by the 1958 film house on haunted hill starring vincent price .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: directed by william malone .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: starring geoffrey rush , famke janssen , and chris kattan .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: rated r ( contains violence , profanity , and brief nudity ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: synopsis : eccentric millionaire price offers $1 , 000 , 000 to each of his guests who appear at a gathering at a former sanitarium .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the only catch is that they have to survive the night at the establishment , an establishment haunted by its former staff and patients .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: comments : house on haunted hill is based upon the original 1958 film of the same title directed by william castle and starring vincent price .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in an obvious homage , the millionaire's name is price and he sports a thin mustache like price used to have .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is a pretty bad horror film , yet bad horror films sometimes are very entertaining , and house on haunted hill is just such a film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is , surprisingly , better than another recent haunted house remake , the haunting , a film which owes its basis to the classic horror novel by shirley jackson .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the haunting had literary pretensions and fell flat on it face .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: house on haunted hill owes its lineage to a b-movie 40 years old and makes no illusion that it's a crappy horror movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: thus , somehow , it proves slightly more successful .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i can't think of another recent film which has had such an eclectic cast .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is this cast which lifts this ho-hum thriller into a borderline entertaining exercise in camp horror .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: price , the main character , is played by geoffrey rush , the academy-award winning actor of shine .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: rush seems to be making a downward spiral in the movie industry , a spiral reminiscent of ben ( ghandi , schindler's list ) kingsley's ridiculous appearance in the camp sci-fi classic species .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i don't know why , but sometimes it's entertaining to see " quality " actors in bad movies .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: more surprises ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: rising star taye diggs plays a stereotypical african american sports figure ( rather lamely too ) , and singer lisa loeb ( ! )
docs.label: negative

docs.text: appears as a tv news reporter .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the highlight of the cast , however , has to be saturday night live member chris kattan .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: kattan's comic sense provides several good humorous moments as he plays the hysterical proprietor of the former sanitarium .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while the first half of the film leaves the audience guessing as to what's exactly going on , the second half dissolves into standard ghost story stuff and loses some of its suspense .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a disappointingly cheesy ending really mars this movie too .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: house on haunted hill , i suspect , has just about left the second-run theaters .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's worth catching on cable next year , if you get a chance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if you have a choice , pick this movie over the haunting , it's the better of two evils , you could say .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: though , more appropriately perhaps , it'd be better to say that it's the better of two turkeys .
docs.label: negative
